name: Frio2 - Memory of my sister
description: A horror adventure game with a new twist that requires various actions.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 98 Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM)2 Duo 2.8 / Athlon(TM) X2 3.0 Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce 9600 GS, Radeon HD4000 Storage: 550 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM)2 Quad 2.8 Ghz, AMD Phenom(TM)II X4 3.0 Ghz Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTS 250, Radeon HD 5760 Storage: 550 MB available space
